title: New: Bon Iver – Calgary
content:
Four years on from the fantastic For Emma, Forever Ago, and Wisconsin folk act Bon Iver are back with a new self-titled record.

In the years since the release of his debut album, he has become increasingly popular, which has shown in Vernon’s work, appearing on a couple of  Kanye West tracks last year, as well as headlining shows all around the world, he’s a star in his own right.

Calgary is the first track to be taken from his new record which is out towards the end of June, and showcases a bolder, cleaner sound, yet maintains the elegantly, masterful vocals that are so revered by fans of his music. Predominantly organ driven, it’s a worthwhile and timely reminder of Vernon’s immense talent as both as a musician and a songwriter.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
